name: fullstack-bun
description: Synq Multi-App Platform - A monorepo web platform powered by Bun, ElysiaJS, React, and Svelte
author: Will Stone <willstone@gmail.com>

scripts.build: bun run build:apps && bun run compile && bun run verify
scripts.build:apps: bun run build:vibesynq && bun run build:admin && bun run build:public
scripts.build:all: bun run build:vibesynq && bun run build:admin
scripts.build:public: echo 'Public directory structure preserved for Railpack deployment'
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Railpack build completed - all apps and public files ready'
scripts.verify: node scripts/verify-build.js || echo 'Verification failed but continuing with deployment'
scripts.dev: concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "SERVER,VIBESYNQ,ADMIN" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "bun run --hot src/server/index.ts" "bun run dev:vibesynq" "bun run dev:admin"
scripts.dev:vibesynq: concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "SERVER,VIBESYNQ" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "bun run --hot src/server/index.ts" "cd apps/vibesynq && bunx --bun vite"
scripts.dev:admin: concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "SERVER,ADMIN" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "bun run --hot src/server/index.ts" "cd apps/admin && bunx --bun vite"
scripts.docker:stop: powershell -Command "docker ps -q --filter ancestor=synq-chat | ForEach-Object { docker stop $_ }"
